{{Terminology Infobox
|type         = Enemies
}}
<section begin=NormalBossDesc />'''Normal Boss''' challenges contain enemies much stronger than [[Elite Enemies]], but also provide better rewards for defeating them. Unlike Elite Enemies, once they have been defeated a [[Trounce Blossom]] will spawn in the area, and players can use {{Item|Original Resin|30|x=40}} to open them to claim their rewards. They respawn after a few minutes, but you must leave the area around the boss, such as teleporting out to the nearest waypoint or logging out of the game.

Normal Boss enemies reward {{Item|Adventure EXP|30|x=200}}  along with a certain amount of {{Item|Mora|30}} and {{Item|Companionship EXP|30}}  depending on the player's [[World Level]]. There is also a chance they will drop certain [[Character Ascension Material]]s, and [[Artifacts]] depending on the level and type of the boss.<section end=NormalBossDesc />

In some rare cases, a Normal Boss may consist of multiple Elite Enemies. This has only happened with the [[Coral Defenders]] challenge, where the Normal Bosses are a [[Rimebiter Bathysmal Vishap]] and a [[Bolteater Bathysmal Vishap]].
